      • splitAt

        void splitAt(int i,
           int j)
        Split (freeze) view. Splits the sheet so that rows above i and columns to the left of j remain in view when scrolling.
        Parameters:
        i - row number
        j - column number

      • getSplitRow

        int getSplitRow()
        Get the split row.
        Returns:
        the number of the first row that will not remain at a fixed position when scrolling
